attributes.action: Ask the Queen To Dissolve Parliament ASAP after June 4th
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call on the Prime Minister ask the Queen To dissolve Parliament early and call a General election as soon as possible after June 4th.  We call for this because we no longer have any faith in our present MP's after all the recent scandals and this opportunity will give us a chance to renew some faith in the system.   We the underlined and the taxpayers demand that our voices be heard and listen to.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
